duties_responsibilities.duty: Visit wholesale counters and stores to execute merchandising refreshes and ensure high VM standards
Perform regular VM visits with Independent accounts Ø
Develop and train Visual Associates and Wholesale teams in the field

Collaborate with VMM to create and maintain VM calendar and strategy
